name: A.N.Y. Safety Patrol
description:
You're new at school and the first day is often exciting, but it gets pretty lame soon. Not on A.N.Y Middle school! Join the safety patrol and solve all the dirty crimes, happening at school.

I'm developing a little pixelart adventure. This is a super early prototype of the beginning of the game and the first case.  Would be very grateful  for any feedback about the overall gameplay, because this is the first game I ever put my developer hands on.

  • Walking:  Arrows /  WASD
  • Confirm/Interact: Enter
  • Pause: ESC / Z
  • Or use a gamepad.  I tried it with a low budget one. :)

If you encounter any problems please feel free to comment or write me on Twitter @NickHatBoecker

Most assets are from finalboss'  Omega Modern Graphics Pack.
Check it out here: https://finalbossblues.itch.io/omega-modern-graphics-pack
